message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you our premium product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm offering the product to you for $18000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Would you be willing to consider $15000 as a fair price for the product?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that my product can bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $16500. This is a one-time offer, and I'm not sure I can go any lower.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose $15000 as the final price for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
